meanings.definition: Edit (a film or recording) for a second time to make corrections or improvements.
meanings.sent1: She reedits the video to fix mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He always reedits his essays before submitting them.
meanings.sent3: The director reedits the movie, but the actors keep making bloopers.
meanings.sent4: Reedits the song until it sounds perfect.
meanings.sent5: After she reedits the photo, it looks much better.

meanings.definition: Make changes to (written or recorded content) in order to improve or update it.
meanings.sent1: The author reedits the manuscript to add more details.
meanings.sent2: They reedits the website regularly to keep it current.
meanings.sent3: He reedits his speech, but it still sounds boring.
meanings.sent4: Reedits the document to reflect the latest information.
meanings.sent5: She reedits the article to make it more engaging.
